PageWidgetPortable.Title: Orçamentos físicos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>CT_VERSOESORCAMENTOS.FISICO.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(SELECT COUNT(CG.HANDLE) FROM CT_CONTASGERENCIAIS CG WHERE CG.ORCAMENTO = 'F' AND CG.PLANO = A.PLANO) > 0 AND A.ESTADO = 'E'</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
